song.title: Miracles
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .Bm F#m G
[1] .Bm F#m The One who made the blind to see . G Is moving here in front of me . Moving here in front of me .Bm F#m The One who made the deaf to hear . G Is silencing my every fear . Silencing my every fear
[C] .Bm G I believe in You I believe in You .D A You're the God of miracles .Bm G I believe in You, I believe in You .D A You're the God of miracles
[Interlude] .Bm F#m G ---
[2] .Bm F#m The One who does impossible . G Is reaching out to make me whole . Reaching out to make me whole .Bm F#m The One who put death in its place . G His life is flowing through my veins . His life is flowing through my veins
[Instrumental] .G A D/F# Bm G A D/F# Bm
[B] .G A The God who was and is to come .D/F# Bm The power of the risen One .G A The God who brings the dead to life . D You're the God of miracles . You're the God of miracles
